title: Leblanc is too weak
body: Havent played league for a long time and getting back to the game i realised that my main leblanc got nerfed so much. Rito please buff her abilities a bit so she can deal some dmg to other mid champs

replies.body: All of her damage comes from her passive now, they reworked her to be based more around trickery and less about 100-0ing people. She is still very good, she just can't burst people as fast as she used to be able to.
thats the problem she should be able to burst everything to fast

In the assassin rework they widened the burst window for all of the assassins to make counterplay possible. Now you have to use your abilities to both deal damage and avoid taking damage long enough to kill people.
"counterplay possible". Have you seen talon and assassin-kayn? wheres the counterplay to being killed in 0.1 second by those guys

Admittedly with the buffs of the duskblade the window is quite a bit shorter on the champs that can abuse it.

Counterplay in cases such as that is found in positioning. If you let your teammates cc them or cc them yourself then you can probably take them out easily. They are both very squishy.
Leblanc was changed she either gets fed and carries or she falls off and farm up and scales.If you want to burst and assassinate you need {{item:3041}} {{item:3146}} {{item:3100}}
